description: The Apple 16” MacBook Pro elevates the notebook to a whole new level of performance and portability. Wherever your ideas take you, you’ll get there faster than ever with high-performance processors, advanced graphics and more.
name: Apple Macbook Pro 16" 2020

reviews.author: Ellie
reviews.description: The lamp burned out and now I have to replace it.
reviews.name: Not a happy camper
